name: Cell Shocked
description:
In this tower defense-meets-TPS game, you play as Iggy, a quick-witted, sharp-shooting antibody deployed to tackle one monstrous infection. The Body is doing its best to keep up, but it needs your help! You’ll have to dodge toxic bugs, manage power-ups, drop turrets, and take down one sick boss to complete your mission:

Ensure sure the Body makes it out of this thing alive!

-- -- -- -- -- --

Cell Shocked was made for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2022 game jam, with the theme of “Every Life Counts.”

Khenan Newton, Project Manager & Leader Programmer

James Cunningham, Developer

Andrew Letailleur, Developer

Mark Samani, Composer

Harleen Singh, Sound Designer

Kelsey Fox Reyes, Narrative Designer

Julia Mirae Nin, 2D Character Artist

Kshitij Gupta, 3D Character Artist

Simon Breumier, 3D Environment Artist

Irene Geller, UI & Graphic Designer

Obert Chen, Play Testing
